  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Channel
    Wraps a connection to a bidirectional stream of bytes.
    ChannelDataCmd  
    ChannelDataInd  
    Channels24  
    CommandHandler
    Exposes a method to send data units using a data handler.
    ComposedPacket  
    ConfirmationResult  
    CorsFilter
    Enables cors-accesses for all endpoints.
    DataFrame  
    DataHandler
    Wraps functionalism's to transmit and receive data units over a channel.
    DemoConfiguration
    Loads a set of parameters from properties.
    EventBroker
    Allows to register and unregister EventPublisher
    EventPublisher
    Allows subscription of published events.
    EventSubscriber
    Provides methods to send events to subscribers and kick subscribers.
    FragHeader
    Contains static methods to detect and process fragmentation-header ( @link https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4944#section-5.3 ).
    FragmentedPacket  
    FragmentQueue
    Stores fragments of IPv6 packets and composes them if they are complete
    FragmentQueueCounter
    Helper class for the fragment queue.
    FragmentQueueElement
    Element of a FragmentQueue
    FrameComposer
    Implementation of PacketToFrame, using a subset of RFC 68282 as specification.
    FrameToPacket
    Transforms a data unit from IEEE 802.15.4 format to IPv6 format using 6lowPAN adaptation specifications.
    GlassPanApp
    Main class, that launches a http-server and a socket-server.
    IndicationHandler
    Exposes functionalism's to subscribe incoming data units and maintain activity.
    IphcAddress
    Wraps an IPv6 address and provides methods to check it for compatibility ( @link https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6282 ).
    IphcHeader
    Contains constants and static methods to process IPv6 packets in a 6lowPAN environment
    IpV6Header
    Wraps all parameter necessary for 6lowPAN compression.
    Ipv6toLowPan
    Helper class for PacketComposer
    JSerialChannel  
    LinkHeader
    Wraps all addressing parameter necessary for transmission over IEEE 802.15.4 .
    LowPanAdaptationService  
    LowPanToIpv6
    Helper class for FrameComposer
    LpanBinder  
    MacAdaptation
    Represents a transceiver interface that is able to communicate over IEEE 802.15.4
    MacBinder  
    MacBroker
    Wraps multiple MacAdaptation

    PacketComposer
    Implementation of FrameToPacket, using a subset of RFC 68282 as specification.
    PacketElement

    PacketToFrame
    Transforms a data unit from IPv6 format to IEEE 802.15.4 format using 6lowPAN adaptation specifications.

    Sets the transceiver-interface in a state witch allows to send and receive data.
